detailsPage.briefDescription: A fully-featured fitness platform connecting trainers and clients with booking, payment, and personalized workout tracking.
detailsPage.challengesFaced: Implementing real-time booking slots, secure payment integration, and role-based access control.
detailsPage.potentialImprovements: Add AI-driven personalized workout plans and nutrition tracking.

detailsPage.briefDescription: A responsive blogging platform supporting user posts, comments, wishlists, and admin moderation.
detailsPage.challengesFaced: Handling complex state for wishlists, ensuring secure authentication, and building admin dashboard features.
detailsPage.potentialImprovements: Add markdown editor and content recommendation system.

detailsPage.briefDescription: A platform for freelancers to showcase services, manage projects, and handle client payments seamlessly.
detailsPage.challengesFaced: Building secure payment workflows, managing user roles, and integrating project management features.
detailsPage.potentialImprovements: Introduce AI-powered matching between clients and freelancers.
